settings.enableHelp: When enabled, Iris features will be available for all students in this course.
settings.customInstructionsPlaceholder: e.g., 'This course uses Python 3.12 and the pytest framework'
settings.customInstructionsHelp: Provide Iris with important context about your course content. This can include programming languages, frameworks, libraries, or other course-specific knowledge that helps Iris assist your students better.
settings.adminOnly: Only administrators can see and modify these settings.
settings.variantHelp: Select the AI pipeline variant to use for this course.
settings.rateLimitHelp: Leave both fields empty to use application defaults. Set 0 requests to block all Iris usage. Timeframe must be at least 1 hour.

rateLimitValidation.bothRequired: Both fields must be filled or both must be empty. Leave both empty to use application defaults.
rateLimitValidation.requestsNonNegative: Maximum requests must be 0 or greater (0 = no requests allowed).
rateLimitValidation.timeframePositive: Timeframe must be at least 1 hour.

error.noSettings: Unable to load settings. Please contact your administrator if this problem persists.

proactivityBuildFailedEventEnabled.label: Monitor submission build failures
proactivityBuildFailedEventEnabled.tooltip: When enabled, Iris will proactively send help messages if a submission build fails.

proactivityProgressStalledEventEnabled.label: Monitor exercise performance progress
proactivityProgressStalledEventEnabled.tooltip: When enabled, Iris will proactively send help messages if the student's exercise performance does not improve.

proactivitySettings.title: Proactivity Settings
proactivitySettings.tooltip: Enable options below to allow Iris to proactively reach out to students when specific conditions are met.
proactivitySettings.parentDisabled: Iris won't send proactive messages for this option because either the option itself or Iris are disabled in the current or parent settings.

subSettings.rateLimitTooltip: The maximum number of answers a user can receive from the LLM in a given time period.
subSettings.rateLimitTimeframeHoursTooltip: The time period in which the rate limit applies in hours.

disabled.course: IRIS is disabled in course IRIS settings
disabled.global: IRIS is disabled in global IRIS settings

customInstructions.title: Custom Instructions
customInstructions.description: Custom instructions to be provided to the AI when generating responses.
customInstructions.placeholder: Enter custom instructions for the AI (max 2048 characters)

settings.title: Iris Settings

error.forbidden: Artemis is not configured to use Iris. (Invalid token)
error.internalPyrisError: An internal error when communicating with the LLM occurred. Error message is: {{ pyrisErrorMessage }}.
error.invalidTemplate: The template is invalid. Error message is: {{ pyrisErrorMessage }}.
error.noVariantAvailable: Variant {{ variant }} is not available to use. Please contact your administrator if this problem persists.
error.noResponse: No response from Iris was received.
error.parseResponse: An error occurred while parsing the response from Iris. Cause: {{ cause }}

ingestionAlert.lectureNotFound: Could not send lecture to Iris, no lecture found with the provided id.

controlCenter.tooltip: Enable or disable Iris for your course. To configure custom instructions, click the configure button.

relatedEntityTooltip.programmingExercise: This chat is related to a programming exercise.
